english: Let us join hands and advance together .
chinese: 让我们携起手来，共同前进。

english: She had found it well to flutter ahead .
chinese: 她发觉最好的办法是曲线前进。

english: Our ship made head against the wind and waves .
chinese: 我们的船顶着风浪前进。

english: The two armies joined forces and marched on .
The boat made slow headway against the tide .
chinese: 那船逆着潮水缓慢地前进。
前进造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Each new step is bought with disappointments .
chinese: 每前进一步都伴随着失望。
他们在大西洋中作之字形前进。

english: The enemy fell back as our troops advanced .
To go forward at all is to go forward together .
chinese: 要前进就大家一起前进。

english: The soldiers advanced in close formation .
chinese: 士兵排成密集队形前进。

english: A swamp opposed the advance of the army .
chinese: 沼地阻碍了军队的前进。

english: No one can halt [stop] the advance of history .
chinese: 谁也不能挡住历史的前进。

english: We have checked the enemy's advance .
chinese: 我们业已挡住了敌军的前进。

english: Face the rough weather of struggle and forge ahead .

chinese: 我们快快活活地朝东慢慢前进。
